situation.title: Help for people with disabilities
situation.meta_description: Specialized help for people with disabilities

content.processed:
In case you just need to talk to someone or talk about any issues you might be having, you can contact the following helplines:

For the hearing impaired

  • Friend on video call (chcipomoct.cz) - send an SMS to the number 777 778 538, the service will then contact you and provide contact with a volunteer who speaks Czech sign language, FREE OF CHARGE

People with different types of disabilities

  • Helpline for the elderly and those in need: 800 160 166, non-stop, online transcription is provided only on weekdays from 9 am to 6 pm, FREE OF CHARGE
